dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but seriously, like, is weather reporting just getting too much now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but seriously, like, is weather reporting just getting too much now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, yes! Exactly! Like, this Kazhydromet warning for March 31st?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, yes! Exactly! Like, this Kazhydromet warning for March thirty first?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Due to adverse weather conditions in several regions of Kazakhstan on March 31, Kazhydromet issued a storm warning.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? It's just... a storm warning, fine. But then it's like, "southwest wind, gusts 15-20 meters per second in Akmola."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? It's just... a storm warning, fine. But then it's like, southwest wind, gusts fifteen to twenty meters per second in Akmola.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the day in the west, north of the Akmola region, a southwest wind is expected, gusts of 15-20 meters per second.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Kokshetau, too, uh, 15 meters per second! Who needs that level of detail?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Kokshetau, too, uh, fifteen meters per second! Who needs that level of detail?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Kokshetau on March 31, a southwest wind is expected, gusts of 15 meters per second during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And then, like, Aktobe region, southeast wind, another 15-20 meters per second. It's just a laundry list!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And then, like, Aktobe region, southeast wind, another fifteen to twenty meters per second. It's just a laundry list!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the Aktobe region, a southeast, south wind is expected; during the day in the west, south of the region, gusts of 15-20 meters per second.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And, oh, don't forget the fog! Almaty region, mountainous areas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, oh, don't forget the fog! Almaty region, mountainous areas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Fog is expected at night and in the morning in the south, in the mountainous areas of the Almaty region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Fog! But then, the dust storms, Host B! Atyrau, dust storm expected, with southeast wind, 15-20!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fog! But then, the dust storms, Host B! Atyrau, dust storm expected, with southeast wind, fifteen to twenty!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the day, a dust storm is expected in the west, south, east of the Atyrau region. Southeast wind; in the west, south, east of the region gusts of 15-20 meters per second.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: In Atyrau itself, too, like, in the afternoon. With specific gusts of 15-18!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: In Atyrau itself, too, like, in the afternoon. With specific gusts of fifteen to eighteen!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Atyrau, a dust storm is expected in the afternoon on March 31. South-east wind; in the afternoon gusts of 15-18 meters per second.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I know! It’s, um, it’s just so much wind and dust everywhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I know! It's, um, it's just so much wind and dust everywhere.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And then more fog in Zhambyl! Plus northeast wind, 15-20 in the mountains.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then more fog in Zhambyl! Plus northeast wind, fifteen to twenty in the mountains.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Fog is expected at night and in the morning in the south, in the mountainous areas of the Zhambyl region. North-east wind; in the mountainous areas of the region 15-20 meters per second.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, basically, every single region of Kazakhstan is getting hit with something specific.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, basically, every single region of Kazakhstan is getting hit with something specific.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: North Kazakhstan region gets rain! During the day, then at night in the southwest.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: North Kazakhstan region gets rain! During the day, then at night in the southwest.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rain is expected in the North Kazakhstan region during the day, and at night in the southwest.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But the dust storms! Mangystau region, west, northeast, center. 17-22 meters per second!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the dust storms! Mangystau region, west, northeast, center. seventeen to twenty two meters per second!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A dust storm is expected in the west, northeast, and center of the Mangystau region during the day. Southeast wind; 17-22 meters per second in the west, northeast, and center of the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Aktau! Same day, same gusts. It's just, wow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Aktau! Same day, same gusts. It's just, wow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A dust storm is expected in Aktau on March 31 during the day. Southeast wind, gusts of 17-22 meters per second during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Like, just tell me it's going to be windy and dusty. I don't need the meter-per-second breakdown for every single town, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Like, just tell me it's going to be windy and dusty. I don't need the meter-per-second breakdown for every single town, you know?
